q1: How did the Brazil national team do in the World Cup?
a1: Decent, Coutinho was awesome, the major problem was Neymar
q2: How far did Brazil go in the World Cup?
a2: Belgium beat them in the quarter-finals.
q3: How far do you think Brazil will go in the next World Cup?
q4: Why won't they make it to the finals?
a4: Team is very raw, lacking chemistry, lack of discipline in the back
q5: How should they fix the back, new players?
a5: They just need to get some experience under their belts
